title: [K-12] Mobile-Based Remote Language Learning Design: Microlearning Course Utilizing Visual Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone proficiency and beginner-level language learning experience
context.additional_context: Language course operating in smartphone-limited tech environments requiring efficient content delivery through visual instructional design tools

learning_goals: Learners can design 15-minute microlearning modules three times a week using the LAMS tool.
Learners can construct language learning activity sequences by applying the visual instructional design language (MOT+/COLLAGE).
Learners can participate in collaboration-based role-play activities in smartphone environments at a rate of 90% or higher.
Learners can demonstrate language communication skills by scoring 80 points or higher in summative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
